snippet: Officials said they hoped the later early application deadlines would not only give some practical relief to students struggling with the Common Application, but also calm them down.
abstract: Several of nation’s top colleges and universities postpone their early application deadlines, prompted by continued reports that students and high schools are stumbling over technical problems with the Common Application; process, which students fill out online, is used by 517 colleges and universities, including nearly all of the most prestigious.
lead_paragraph: Officials said they hoped the later early application deadlines would not only give some practical relief to students struggling with the Common Application, but also calm them down.
